amendment.description: To prohibit funds from being used for reorganization of the Department of Agriculture and to require a benefit-cost analysis on that reorganization, a public comment period, and a report.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3115 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 53. Record Vote Number: 474.

action.text: Amendment SA 3115 proposed by Senator Van Hollen to Amendment SA 3411. To prohibit funds from being used for reorganization of the Department of Agriculture and to require a benefit-cost analysis on that reorganization, a public comment period, and a report.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3115 proposed by Senator Van Hollen to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3115 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 53. Record Vote Number: 474.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3115 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 53. Record Vote Number: 474.
